promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare chameleon steel-type pokemon wearing ancient armor. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armachami, a a chibi cute rare chameleon steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Crushing Earth, Cleaning Up. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "steel" or "Armachami". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, chameleon-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive charmer thrives in arid landscapes, skillfully melding with metallic surroundings. Tirelessly tidying its habitat, it also shatters rock foes.
